ygData.subject: RE: Abashi's Thread
ygData.msgSnippet: Obviously they are stepping up their anti-bard defenses. ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:Michael.Garramone@cox.com] Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Obviously they are stepping up their anti-bard defenses.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 1:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's Thread


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

gee thanks man, this is the message i got...

"We have noted your attempt to hack this forum. Authorities will be notified
if you persist."

wtf?

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
>
> So here I sit, after 3 hours straight of trying to get in on
> the last day
> that this thread will be available to post on. What have I
> learned in all
> of this time?
>
> "Internet Explorer cannot open this Internet site
> http://boards-cgi.station.sony.com/everquest/cgi-bin/postings.
cgi?action=rep
ly&forum... blah, blah,blah
A connection with the server could not be established."

Well, that's lovely... just friggin lovely. Anyone else have this problem
with the boards at the EQ site?
